alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 7:21PM AKST until February 27 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area including Craig, Hydaburg, Kasaan, Thorne Bay, Ketchikan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty conditions are expected throughout this time period.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
